::Shadow Wing::

She noticed that his voice tremble a bite with those last words that he 
spoke. She stopped and landed next to him. "Not home, staying with friends, 
but not a home.  Home is here in the trees, hunting, finding a companion, 
flying in and out of the trees, playing in the rivers and running on the 
hillsides.  Wakingup to the sounds of the forest.  Here is home.  There is 
being with friends who need your help." She looked at him for a moment 
realized how she sounded. She knew that she was giving up a lot too.
"When the war is over, I'm coming back here."


-------Original Message---
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 8:04pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Her answer gave him alot to think about. he knew she was sincere, but
on this planet animals didn't help each other without getting
something back. Is this all his race was,? based on his limited
knowledge of war and survival Lunarpine knew that one thing is true.
In war there are no friends, only interests. If this is true then why
was she being so nice?

Lunarpine took a quick glance behind him, will his new home be this
way or is there more to his type of beings than he realized.

"I guess you should call for a ride, Your friends wouldn't know my
voice."Lets go....."Lunarpine trembled at the thought of leaving this
place for a new life in a strange land,...."Home".
